resources.string:
TIME ZONE
> Seoul in Korea : 9
> St.John's in Canana : -2.5
>Los Angeles in US : -7
RENAME or COPY\nIf this switch is ON, vmate source files will be renamed with new name\nIf this switch ON, files will be copied into DCIM folder
DELETE AFTER COPY\nIf this switch is ON, vmate source files will be deleted one by one just after copying into destination folder\nRemember that you still have source in vmate gimbbal camera.
